ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Return plot attributes for multiple plots

DESC.PARA: The get_split_plot command returns a split plot object which holds references to various plot preferences and data arrays. The attributes of the multi-plot display include:

LIST.ITEM: rows - number of rows of plots; default = 2
cols - number of columns of plots; default = 1

DESC.PARA: Return a split plot object and store it in the variable "sp".

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
